features.1: Removed R&D functionality from production app.
features.2: Updated reader threads to start/stop individually.
features.3: Updated readers to upload their own analyzed files for the production dashboard.
features.4: Updated experiment ID to lot ID
features.5: Added tagging by incubator ID, which can be updated by the guided setup form for now.

other.1: Removed all functionality related to inoculation.
other.2: Removed all functionality related to manual issue reporting.
other.3: Removed all functionality related to experiment notes.
other.4: Removed all functionality related to summary plotting.
other.5: Removed all functionality related to second axis.
other.6: Removed most advanced settings from the menubar.
other.7: Removed all functionality related to end of experiment view.
other.8: Removed version.json in place with a type checking python class.
other.9: Added 'smart' display toggle to only update display of readers who have reached equilibration time.
other.10: Moved guided setup form to center on the readers frame.

features.1: Added a post processing script to begin testing harvest algorithm work.

bugfixes.1: Fixed a bug causing summary plot to be hidden on occasion.

features.1: Created menubar before guided setup to allow for easier software updates.
features.2: Updated max readers connected to be 16.
features.3: Updated S3 files to have caching disabled.
features.4: Updated default frequency range to 100-160 MHz

bugfixes.1: Removed display option until equilibration period is met.

features.1: Added `..by operator` tags on issue creation/resolution messages.

bugfixes.1: Updated timestamps to properly use local time.
bugfixes.2: Fixed race condition for messages sent in dashboard/app at similar times.

features.1: Enlarged text box for adding messages to issues.

bugfixes.1: Fixed issue causing summary figure to be covered up by issue log.
bugfixes.2: Fixed issue causing summary csv to be uploaded to AWS every scan.

other.1: Fixed dev mode to not upload to AWS anymore.

features.1: Added equilibration time of 6 minutes for testing purposes.
features.2: Removed automated issue reporting for reconnect issues.

features.1: Added automated error reporting for hardware/analysis errors.
Updated issue log to pull from AWS on an interval.
Updated summary analyzed and experiment notes to work with dashboard.
Added an issue log to view/manage issues and linked it to AWS.
Rearranged previous/next buttons, and removed them if only one page is available.
features.2: Adjusted sizing of plots and labels to work with new layout.

features.1: Updated reader plots to be a 2x2 grid with 4 reader maximum

other.1: Refactored GUI to be more modular

features.1: Added a post-processing script to re-analyze data.
Now uploading summary csv instead of pdf
features.2: Experiment log is now uploaded in the experiment folder for the company.
features.3: Summary PDF now has experiment notes shown on the front page, rather than by the reader plots.
features.4: Summary PDF now places each readers plot on their own page.

bugfixes.1: App properly resets using new setup values. Introduced in v2.5.3
bugfixes.2: App properly handles equilibration time and SGI for multiple readers.
bugfixes.3: App properly handles the toggling between SGI and signal check.

other.1: Now properly parsing software update tags instead of relying on their order.
other.2: Inoculation was also updated to work with new experiment notes.
other.3: App properly handles software updates using new file structure.

features.1: Replaced `Cell Type` with `Experiment Id` on setup form

bugfixes.1: Fixed software updated bug introduces in v2.5.3

other.1: Updated guided setup to use an object rather than variables.

features.1: Reorganized file structure for data and backend files.
Added analysis time to derivative script.
